post.text: It's tough to find a man with more integrity and conviction than Tim Kaine.

comment.author: Emily
comment.text: Hillary, your days are numbered, karma is coming for you!

replies.author: Kaitlyn
replies.text: Same old rhetoric. Get a new saying. GO HILLARY

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Justin I promise you Hillary is going to jail. I know democrats can't accept the truth. You may want to fine a bridge to jump from. It will be a shock to you.
